VLIB Function Reference

Fundamental Matrix Estimation

Introduction and Use Cases

Fundamental matrix defines the relationship between two stereo images. This API takes matching key points list from two frames and estimates the Fundamental Matrix between those two frames.

Specification

Method

See the APIs of each function to see the method of each.

APIS

  • VLIB_findFundamentalMat

References

  1. Richard I. Hartley, In Defence of the 8-point Algorithm. In IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON PATTERN ANALYSIS AND MACHINE INTELLIGENCE, VOL. 19, NO. 6, JUNE 1997
